overview:
In 1997 Elisabeth co-founded Whitehill Technologies Inc., now part of Skywire Software. During Elisabeth’s time as CEO she recruited a world class executive team and developed the overall strategic direction that catapulted the firm to quickly become Canada’s fifth largest privately-held software company. For her work Elisabeth was awarded the Young Entrepreneur of the Year Award by PROFIT Magazine and one of the “Top 50 CEOs in Atlantic Canada” by Progress Magazine.

Elisabeth’s specialization in early business strategy and innovation has made her an ideal candidate to lead international teams to investigate and advise on commercialization opportunities for privately financed research and development initiatives - including an advanced mathematical and geometric solver aimed at satisfaction/optimization problems for CAD/CAM systems, logistics and workforce management applications.
